assignments.description: Set Flag to a boolean variable to process further. From UI , String 'Yes'/'No' is receiving.
assignments.name: Assign_Accepted_Flag_to_a_Variable
assignments.label: Set Is Accepted Flag to True

assignments.description: Assign application id to a variable
assignments.name: Assign_Application_Id
assignments.label: Assign Application Id in a Variable

assignments.description: Assign Valid SA of Selected Premise to Collection Variable for future reference
assignments.name: Assign_SA_Ids_To_Collection_Variable
assignments.label: Assign SA Ids To Valid SA Id Collection

assignments.description: Assign Valid SA Ids To Variable
assignments.name: Assign_Valid_SA_IDs_To_Variable
assignments.label: Assign Valid SA Ids To Collection Variable

assignments.description: Set Care customer flag - True if Care End date is future date.
assignments.name: Set_CARE_FERA_Customer_Flag
assignments.label: Set Current CARE/FERA Customer Flag=True

assignments.description: Set Current SA RS Valid Flag True
assignments.name: Set_Current_Item_is_Valid
assignments.label: Set Current SA RS Valid Flag True

assignments.description: Set Current SA RS Valid Flag To False
assignments.name: Set_Current_SA_RS_Valid_Flag_False
assignments.label: Set Current SA RS Valid Flag False

assignments.description: Set Flag for customer has discount on other premise other than selected
assignments.name: Set_Discount_On_Other_Premise_Flag
assignments.label: Set Discounted On Other Premise Flag =True

decisions.description: Check Is accepted Flag received from UI. Since all the inputs receiving from UI are List of String , Yes/No will be the input.Based on that Boolean flag will set in Flow.
decisions.name: Check_Is_Accepted_Value
decisions.label: Check Is Accepted Value=Yes

decisions.description: Check SA Status - Active or Not and Rate Schedule is Valid
decisions.name: Check_SA_Status
decisions.label: Is SA Status Active?

decisions.description: Does Customer has CC Code VH in last 2 years
decisions.name: Does_Customer_has_CC_Code_VH
decisions.label: Does Customer has CC Code VH/M?

decisions.description: Does Meet Re certification Criteria - Criteria has to be created after confirmation
decisions.name: Does_Meet_Recertification_Criteria
decisions.label: Does Meet Re certification Criteria?

decisions.description: Check any Valid SA exists to proceed.
decisions.name: Does_Valid_SA_Exists
decisions.label: Does Valid SA Exists?

decisions.description: Check whether care end date is future date?
decisions.name: Is_Care_End_Date_is_future_date
decisions.label: Is Care End Date is future date?

decisions.description: Check Customer is care customer based on the varIsCareCustomer Flag
decisions.name: Is_Current_CARE_FERA_Customer
decisions.label: Is current CARE FERA Customer?

decisions.description: Check Whether Customer is on Promotion based on the output from sub flow - Output variable Name : varProbationStatus
decisions.name: Is_Customer_On_Probation
decisions.label: Is Customer On Probation?

decisions.description: Is this Discount on Care processor Selected Premise?
decisions.name: Is_This_Discount_On_Selected_Premise
decisions.label: Is this Discount on Selected Premise?

Flow.description: Auto launched flow get triggered on Enrollment Verification.This flow Check Qualification of enrollment and update CC Code based on enrollment input.

formulas.description: Care End date should be less than Today + 90 days
formulas.name: fxRecertificationDay

formulas.description: Formula field to get today's date in variable
formulas.name: fxTodaysDate

Flow.label: CARE Full Qualification Process Flow

loops.description: Loop through Is Accepted Flag collection; Input to flow is always a list.
loops.name: Loop_Accepted_Collection
loops.label: Loop Is Accepted Flag Collection Input

loops.name: Loop_All_SA_IDs
loops.label: Loop All SA IDs Of Premise

loops.description: Loop through all SA Ids and find Valid SA based on SA Rate and Status
loops.name: Loop_All_SA_Ids_of_Customer
loops.label: Loop All SA Ids of Customer

loops.description: Loop application Id and store in a variable
loops.name: Loop_Application_ID
loops.label: Loop Application ID

loops.description: Loop Person Id and assign it to a variable
loops.name: Loop_Person_Id
loops.label: Loop Person Id

loops.description: Loop through Premise IDs and get all SA IDs for the person and Premise
loops.name: Loop_Premise_ID
loops.label: Loop Selected Premise IDs

loops.description: To check rate schedule is valid or not
loops.name: Loop_Valid_Rate_Schedule2
loops.label: Loop Valid Rate Schedule

recordLookups.description: Get All SA Ids of a Person and a Premise
recordLookups.name: All_SA_IDs_Of_A_Premise
recordLookups.label: Get All Valid SA IDs of Premise

recordLookups.description: Get CARE Application Details - To be used in decision boxes
recordLookups.name: Care_Application_Details
recordLookups.label: Get Care Application Details

recordLookups.description: Get customer SA ID from all premises
recordLookups.name: Customer_SA_ID_On_All_Premises
recordLookups.label: Get All SA Ids from all premises

recordLookups.description: Get Valid Rate Schedules (Comma separated Values)
recordLookups.name: Get_Valid_Rate_Schedules
recordLookups.label: Get Valid Rate Schedules

subflows.description: Get Active Status Collection (convert Comma Separated String To List)
subflows.name: Get_Active_Status_Collection
subflows.label: Convert Active Status String To Collection

subflows.description: Get Customer CC Code For Last 2 Years
subflows.name: Get_Customer_CCCode_For_Last_2_Years
subflows.label: Get Customer CCCode For Last 2 Years

subflows.description: Get Rate Schedule Collection (Convert Comma Separated String)
subflows.name: Get_Rate_Schedule_Collection
subflows.label: Convert Rate Schedule String To Collection

variables.description: Store Active Status codes
variables.name: colActiveSAStatus

variables.description: Only list of Application id can be passed to Flow from Apex.Expected only one record in this collection.
variables.name: colCareApplicationIDs_Input

variables.description: Application Accepted or Not: Yes /No
variables.name: colIsApplicationAccepted_Input

variables.description: Person id input.Only one value is expected.
variables.name: colPersonIDs_Input

variables.description: Premise IDs Passed from UI as an Input to this flow
variables.name: colPremiseIDs_Input

variables.description: Valid Rate Schedules (CARE)
variables.name: colValidRateSchedules

variables.description: Loop variable to store each record
variables.name: LoopVarCustomerDiscount

variables.description: Loop variable to hold SA ID
variables.name: loopVarSAID

variables.description: SA details of Other Discounted Premise (If customer has discount on other premise, Need to drop before giving discount
variables.name: recColSAIdsOfOtherDiscountedPremise

variables.description: Record collection variable to store all valid SA of customer on all premises.
variables.name: recColValidSAIdsOfAllPremises

variables.description: Record Collection to Store All Valid SA ID Details of Selected Premise
variables.name: recColValidSAIdsOfSelectedPremise

variables.description: Main Application Id Passed From UI
variables.name: varCareApplicationId

variables.description: Variable to store CC Code Description output of the Full Qualification Logic.
variables.name: varCCCodeDescription_Output

variables.description: Long Description of CC Code
variables.name: varCCCodeLongDescription_Output

variables.description: Customer got CC Code M In Last 2 years
variables.name: varCustomerHas_M_InLast2Years

variables.description: Boolean variable to hold whether customer has VH in last 2 years
variables.name: varCustomerHas_VH_InLast2Years

variables.description: Existing Discount Type
variables.name: varExistingDiscountType

variables.description: Variable to flag if customer has discount on any other premise than selected premise
variables.name: varHasDiscountOnOtherPremise

variables.description: Accept button click flag
variables.name: varIsApplicationAccepted

variables.description: Variable to store whether customer is care customer or not
variables.name: varIsCAREFERACustomer

variables.description: Is Current SA in loop is having valid Rate Schedule
variables.name: varIsCurrentSARateScheduleValid

variables.description: Temp Variable to to store Re certification Qualification - To be deleted and update Re certification logic
variables.name: varIsQualifiedForRecertification

variables.description: Person ID Passed from UI
variables.name: varPersonID_Input

variables.description: Hold the premise id in Loop
variables.name: varPremiseID
